scripts.serve:jekyll: cd jekyll && bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload
scripts.build:react: cd app && npm run build && npm run copy-build
scripts.copy-build: cp -r app/build/* jekyll/assets/app && cp app/build/asset-manifest.json jekyll/_data/
scripts.watch-react: cd app && watch 'npm run build && npm run copy-build' ./src
